channel.title: How do i put npc in a game and make it say things

item.title: How do i put npc in a game and make it say things
item.dc:creator: @0wnz0r 0wnz0r
item.description:
@0wnz0r wrote:

Go to NPChandler.java and search for ‘moo’.
You’ll see this.

					if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) {
						if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo";
						}
					}

After the last ‘}’ press enter and add this:

[code] if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCIDHERE) {
if (misc.random2(20) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “TEXTHERE”;
}
}

[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i put npc in a game and make it say things
